articles.title: Kern sees 62 new coronavirus cases - The Bakersfield Californian
articles.description: There are 62 new confirmed coronavirus cases, the Kern County Public Health Services Department reported Saturday morning.
articles.content:

There are now a total of 1,238 cases, which includes 10 non-residents who tested positive while in the county.
